bibl.title: Living Waters. Scandinavian Orientalistic Studies Presented to Prof. Dr. Frede Løkkegaard on his Seventy-Fifth Birthday January 27th 1990
bibl.note: Dessins et notes de Fr.L. NORDEN, Capitaine des vaisseaux du Roi, conservés à l'Académie Royale Danoise des Sciences et des Lettres.
BUHL Marie-Louise, Frederik Ludvig Norden à Alexandrie en 1737 et 1738.

Egon KECK et alii (Edd.), Living Waters. Scandinavian Orientalistic Studies Presented to Prof. Dr. Frede Løkkegaard on his Seventy-Fifth Birthday January 27th 1990 (Copenhagen, 1990) pp. 31-42, 6 figg.
